page.title: 20EMPLOYMENT.
page.content: We have found that nearly everyone who goes to work in our area don't go more than 20 kilometres to work. Some people go to{Frome}and{Street,}a lot go to{Shepton Mallet,}and some even go to{Bath}or{Bristol.}Most of the people who work on the{farms}live in our area. In{Doulting}is a{silver-smith who lives near the church. His name is Mr. Bowles, but he doesn't sell things from his house. A few people work in the{quarries}that are in nearby D-Blocks. There are three{builders}in the area. One is called Abbey Park Builders from{Doulting,}Albino Brothers also from{Doulting}and Trotmans who come from{Cranmore}and {Dean.}The{teachers}at school come from {Wells, Coleford, Moorwood}near {Oakhill, Havyatt}near{Glastonbury,}and {Frome.
